SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Camera
Camera class will serve as the ability to catch a scene by sending multiple rays through a view plane to the objects
CameraTest
Testing Camera Class
Cylinder
The class Cylinder is the extension of Tube. but unlike Tube, Cylinder is finite Tube
CylinderTest
Testing Cylinder
Double3
This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
Geometries
The class Geometries composites our geometries shapes to build some complex shapes.
GeometriesTest
Testing Geometries
Geometry
The interface Geometry will serve as the representation of a general shape
IntegrationTest
Testing Camera Class
Intersectable
This interface handle in the intersections between the geometries
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Plane
The class Plane will serve as the representation of the shape plane created with 3 points or with point and vector.
PlaneTest
Testing Plane
Point
Point class allows us to represent a point with coordinates x,y,z.
PointTest
Tests for class Point.
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
PolygonTests
Testing Polygons
RadialGeometry
The abstract class RadialGeometry implements the determination of a rounded shape radius and more things down the road.
Ray
Ray class will serve as the ray of a general shape to build the shape later on.
Sphere
The class Sphere extends the RadialGeometry class and allows us to represent a sphere by radius and a point.
SphereTest
Testing Sphere
Triangle
The class Triangle extends the Polygon class and allows us to represent a Triangle by 3 points.
TriangleTest
Testing Triangle
Tube
The class Tube extends the RadialGeometry class and allows us to represent a Tube with radius and ray.
TubeTest
Testing Tube
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
Vector
Vector class will serve as the "upgraded point" to represent direction and size.
VectorTest
Tests for class Vector.
